website_summaries.verdict: If your dog needs a treat that will also help keep his teeth clean, Z-Bones provide a variety of sizes and flavors to suit nearly every canine.
pros: High-quality, grain-free ingredients in an edible teeth-cleaning treat
Freshen breath with ingredients like rosemary and alfalfa
For dogs of all sizes – available in mini, regular, large, and giant
4 flavors: cherry, carrot, apple, and berry
cons: Somewhat costly, and the larger the treat, the higher the price
A few dog owners complained of their dogs having digestive upsets after eating them

customer_reviews.title: Not a great dental chew!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this as a dental chew if your dog is an aggressive chewer. Dental chews are supposed to last awhile (they should provide your dog with a good amount of chewing, during which time your dog is scraping their teeth against the chew and removing bacteria/tarter). This Zuke Z-bone lasted my English bulldog less than 2 minutes. There are better dental chews out there like whimzees & himalayan dog chews, but I like to switch up her chews as a health measure, and these zuke bones just didn't do the job. Poor price point in my opinion since they really didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Dish

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog throw up
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 04/01/2019 - I waited a week before trying to give him these again and he went back to loving them and not throwing up! Going to order more now because nothing has made his breath fresher than these. My dog (70lb Pitbull) was really excited for these treats when I first gave them to him and he was enjoying them immensely for 3 days. I watched him as he ate them so he didn't choke and he loved them and his breath was smelling much better. I did notice, however, that in those 3 days he threw up every single day. This was the only change in his diet. He won't even get anywhere near it anymore :(
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: perfect for stinky dog breath
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden Retriever and Brittany Spaniel LOVE these zukes z-bones! We give them to our dogs after every time we brush their teeth (once a week we brush with Nylabone PB toothpaste from Amazon). Our dogs are roughly 25 and 65lbs and we give both of them this size bone. We watch our larger dog with these bones, but she has not had any issues or chocking with the smaller treat size. They make bigger sizes for the Golden but they are much more expensive and these get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: LynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredents my dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I worry about the different chew bones because some have plastic in them and other bad things that I wouldn't want to eat myself. Not mention the health risk from Ingesting them. These are made of quality ingredients and my dog loves them. I would never give my dog Rawhide, Nylabone, Hartz, or Greenies. Have heard horror stories from vets as well as responsible pet owners about the products I just mentioned. Please do your research before giving anything to your beloved pet.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these. They can eat one in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is grain free, no GMOs or anything like that. The Z-bones help keep my dogs teeth clean, breath fresh and their jaws strong. These are edible bones, not just for chewing. They come in sizes appropriate for your dog. Remember to always be there when your dog is enjoying a treat such as this. Accidents do happen and they can choke. Although that has never happened to any of my dogs. The Zukes Z-bones come in different flavors such as Cranberry, and Carrot. You can buy them as singles or in bags. These are great as a special treat, say for birthdays, holidays , or just because you love your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Doggy crack treats!
customer_reviews.text: My English Bulldogs will eat nearly everything, but I’ve never seen them try to climb up my cabinets to get to the bag on the counter. These are like dog crack! No idea if they work yet, but my fur kids are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Shane P

customer_reviews.title: Update for MY Dog
customer_reviews.text: My pup pup LOVES them. They don't affect her insides. "Maybe not" UPDATE: I have used the mini Carrot bones. I just put 2 & 2 together and found out something with MY dog/girl. I noticed a very bad smell for the last 3 months at certain times. I thought it might be my girls anal glands. I just started started giving her a treat a day and BOOM smelly smell smell. I stopped 2 days ago and no smell. This could be the Carrot flavor mix for my girl. This review is for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Djdc

customer_reviews.title: Recommended By My Vet -- Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Zuke's products! They just seem better quality than many competitors and were on my vet's list of recommended dog dental-related products. I bought dental chews from a certain warehouse membership box store and they made one of my pups digestively ill. Not Zukes! I also buy Zuke’s treats. As for dental cleaning efficacy, that isn’t something I can yet speak to. I don’t brush my dogs’ teeth so I am trying to do what (else) I can to keep them clean. My dogs love them and they don’t make either one ill. Zuke’s Dental chews are atleast a good treat and hopefully a dental hygiene helper.
customer_reviews.author: Calayus

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the large chew treats first but our large breed puppy liked the one I gave (before I realized that she wasn't big enough for it) that I bought the smaller ones. She's an aggressive chewer so she finishes them off pretty quickly but it keeps her busy for a few minutes and seems to clean her teeth pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Meami

customer_reviews.title: The best of the chews! Vegan!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has one of these a day, supposedly for his teeth, but he’s a gulper! These pass through his stomach, unlike Greenies, and no diarrhea!! He loves them. They come in two flavors. They’re vegan. He gives them 5 woofs.
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: New packaging seems to have a new formula - our dog won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: With the new packaging there was a change to the formula. Our dog will not eat the new product. Looks like we're going to need to find a new brand of dental chew. Sad to see this happen and our dog loved the old product. In reading the ingredient list the changes are subtle but clear. Our local store is having a sale on the old version and we're going to stock up so our dog can enjoy them while they are available.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Leeds

customer_reviews.title: My pup is allergic to poultry and grain!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find dry food that is both poultry and grain free let alone a dental chew. This just happened to pop up as a suggestion one day. So glad it did because it’s just what he needs. The chew also has helped so much with his bad breath.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: ... gave my dog one of these for two nights like I have done with the Zuke's z-bone carrot flavors ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave my dog one of these for two nights like I have done with the Zuke's z-bone carrot flavors (that I have loyally purchased for a very long time) and he was VIOLENTLY vomiting both nights due to these apple treats. I threw them in the trash immediately! Guess I'll be changing brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iffy...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs only get treats from Zukes because of the high quality and they are mostly all grain free. They love these bones, however, I had this same brand but the large size from a store and it gave them orange, loose stools. Other brand dental treats also did the same thing, so maybe they can only handle the regular size, but just thought I'd mention it here. Nothing a little probiotic didn't clear right up, but I don't think I'd give these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Duqrn87

customer_reviews.title: Excellent digestible chews
customer_reviews.text: My two pups absolutely love these and I feel comfortable giving them to my dogs for the digestibility. Other products sometimes get chewed too fast and/or swallowed, risking a blockage. I have a 130 lb Newfoundland and 95 lb Lab who can almost inhale chew treats and devour one of these in a couple of minutes. We have enjoyed Zuke's Z-Bones for a long time and only wish the company continued to sell these for Giant dogs, as the large bones are quickly eaten and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Zuke’s might just be Magic!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes absolutely bonkers for these Zuke’s. She some how morphs into a kangaroo or a jackrabbit and hops around the house like a maniac, her paws barely touching the floor. I don’t even have to say anything just reach, not touch, reach for the bag and she instantly and loudly voices her many opinions on the matter. I’ve never heard a dog make such noises, I really believe one day she’s just going to come out and say “May I have a Zuke? Please and thank you, kind human.”
customer_reviews.author: Qu

customer_reviews.title: Mabel loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Mabel loves these. I can't say enough. It did not take long for her to know the look of the bag. I do watch her while she chews them (outside). I bought the larger ones, she is about 54 pounds, and sometimes I cut them in half. Well done Zuke's!
customer_reviews.author: Mabes

customer_reviews.title: Much better than "greenies"
customer_reviews.text: My Corgi loves these. Much better than "greenies". They're a bit softer, so they get eaten quicker, but still provide a good chew for him. I would just say always supervise your dog when they eat a "chew" product. I did notice only a couple times where a little chunk broke off and he got a piece stuck in his mouth between his gums and the fleshy part of the mouth and he was licking and chewing trying to dislodge it - stuck my finger in there and moved it for him. Always good to supervise silly pups when chewing.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes her #2's are a little on the greenish side but nothing to bad & nothing to be concerned about just a heads ...
customer_reviews.text: Our bloodhound mix (61lbs) had a bunch of plaque on her lower back teeth and these really seem to be helping her out, we have been giving her one of these about 2x-3x/week for the last 3 months and there is less plaque build up on her teeth. Sometimes her #2's are a little on the greenish side but nothing to bad & nothing to be concerned about just a heads up to those giving for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: They're a hit me and my pup!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these! The most important thing to me is that they are not rock hard, so you don't have to worry about your pup giving up on trying to chew on a rock and then just swallowing it which might then lead to a vet visit. My pup chews and chews every last morsel. Very happy with these dental chews.
customer_reviews.author: seawind

customer_reviews.title: Cutting down on my dog’s tartar
customer_reviews.text: My three dogs love these. One has bad tartar build up on his teeth, and I noticed these are already helping.
customer_reviews.author: a reader in America

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and my dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: When I first gave these to my dog she didn't seem interested. But once she first bit in she got excited and ate the whole thing in a few minutes. It kinda gums up in her teeth when she eats, thus cleaning out her teeth. Great ingredients and my dogs love them, what more do you want! Doesn't quite freshen her breath (but we are feeding her a bit of fish, so I don't know what would help with that).
customer_reviews.author: SebbyRox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality & MADE IN AMERICA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I no longer give my dog any products made in China. It is very difficult to find a hard dental chew that is made in America. These are not cheap, but they are well worth the cost. They are of excellent quality & my dog loves all 3 flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better For Your Dig Than Greenies
customer_reviews.text: I like Zeke bones because they are healthier for our pets than greenies. (Greenies have so many "what is that" ingredients that I refuse to give them to my dog). But with that being said, I don't give these every day to my dog. They should be given sparingly as "treats," not every day food (just my holistic opinion). My dog does not go crazy for these, but accepts them when offered (most of the time). But then again, my dog is not treat/food driven. Perhaps you should just buy one individually from your local pet store, see if you dog likes it before buying the bag as these treats are EXPENSIVE. Usually $1.99 for one.
customer_reviews.author: TravelGal

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these
customer_reviews.text: After paying $1200 to have 3 teeth on each of my dogs extracted due to fractures from chewing on hooves, I needed to find something they could still chew on without damaging their teeth. My only issue with them is I wish they lasted longer. My boys get so excited when I bring out the bag, but it only takes them 5 minutes or less to finish these off.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E

customer_reviews.title: Dog absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.text: We have only had these a short time, but our dog literally went up to the Amazon box and started pushing at it with his nose. Our dog has never liked fresh-breath treats, but he absolutely adores these. They also seem to make a difference in his breath.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Martiniano

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem like a dental chew.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be made with good ingredients. But I thought a dental chew was something that was crunchy to help clean the dogs teeth. These are kind of soft. My 14 pound dog chews it up in about 20 seconds. She likes it but I don't know that it would help her teeth. They are pretty expensive if they don't help clean the teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up and quality control has issues
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these bones and they don’t throw them up like the CET Hextra chews that I used to give them. However, I pay almost double what they were when I first started buying them from Amazon. I’m not sure what has caused the price to rise so much. I’ve also been disappointed with recent orders due to package counts being off. The first time or two I thought nothing of it. Then I noticed with every few bags I would have an odd amount. I finally started counting and have since realized that I’m being shorted and have only been receiving 17 chews in many off my 18 count packages. Really disappointing considering the cost of these chews.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT Mini
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love the Zuke's brand. Naturally, I was stoked about the dental chews because they have natural ingredients unlike most store-bought brands. If you can find their minimally--processed dog food, go for it! It's the best on the market hands down. Back to the chews: they are by no means 'mini' and therefore I cannot endorse them for that reason. Forget cutting them without a saw... then they're not really a chew anymore anyway.
customer_reviews.author: jdvdj

customer_reviews.title: Beagle approved dental chews
customer_reviews.text: I have two rescue beagles. My dogs can't have grains, which eliminates a lot of the dental chews on the market. The ones I'm left with are pretty expensive when each dog needs one per day. These are a great value. My dogs have clean teeth, fresh breath, and think these are a great treat. If I forget to give them their Z-bone after their breakfast they sit in front of the refrigerator and stare up at the container on the top until I get the hint. My only complaint is that there are only 18 in a bag, so giving 1 each to 2 dogs means one bag lasts just over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Bexie Roo

customer_reviews.title: High quality product made in America!
customer_reviews.text: I no longer give my dog products made in China. It is difficult to find a hard dental chew that is made in America. I also don't give him anything with wheat, corn, animal byproducts, or all the other junk that they put in pet products which further limits the selection. This is a high quality product & my dog loves all 3 flavors. They are not cheap, but my pet's health is important to me. Actually, he is losing some weight as I don't give him this costly treat as freely. That is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed by Acquisition of Zuke's.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have always loved Zuke's Z-Bone Chews. We first bought these and other Zuke's treats after learning the company was a family-owned Colorado business with high standards for quality and safety. I was able to purchase them at smaller local and regional pet supply stores that carry only high quality products--not the large chains. Since I had not been able to find them lately, it was exciting to see them on Amazon. I am now disappointed to learn the company has been acquired by Nestle Purina and will be in those mass distribution channels, likely with lowered quality standards. I'm hoping this bag was manufactured before the acquisition. Sadly I expect it to be the last we purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DDE

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes these
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes the bones, but to me they don’t appear to help his gum/teeth health much since he easily chews them up very quickly, more or less like a regular dog biscuit. I’d prefer he have something he can enjoy for a bit longer while it massages his gums and cleans his teeth. For this reason I also feel they are too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DogLover

customer_reviews.title: Great product but price has become ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and they do help to keep their breath less gross. I trust the brand and the ingredients which is why I did the subscribe and save with amazon to get two bags per month. When I signed up, they were $6 per bag. Then it went up to $12. Now it’s at $17 and I’m going to have to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love these bones
customer_reviews.text: Love these bones, good quality, however, I REALLY REALLY wish they wouldnt have changed the original formula. These contain more starch. I always watch when they chew (I have chihuahuas and poms that chew these) as they get small "nubs" near the end and I worry about choking. Mine also love the cherry, but they can stain.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love Zuke's, no matter what it is
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love Zuke's, no matter what it is. I tried this new product because I thought it might last longer than a dental rawhide we get from the vet. Nah, they had these eaten pretty quick. They loved them, I just wished they lasted a bit longer. I think they're a little too soft and chewy. It was great for my senior dog, but my youngest ate it real fast.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Lemieux III

customer_reviews.title: He also loves Greenies but I think these do a better job at cleaning the teeth and breath
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old very picky Havenese loves these. He also loves Greenies but I think these do a better job at cleaning the teeth and breath. They're pricey for the amount you get but I will continue to order them and intersperse them in with the Greenies a couple of times a week. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: B. Llorente

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and they work!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried one myself but the flavor must be great. My Pitbull has one every morning after breakfast and he seems to look forward to them. They are keeping his teeth clean and his breath fresh. They are a bit expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Himes

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dental chew for my dog to try out because it is grain-free. I only give it to her about twice a week but I noticed the following day after I give it to her she will throw up chunks of the treat with bile. Sorry gross but its true. Could be that my dog doesn't chew it into smaller pieces. I even cut it in half and gave it to her but its still an issue. I threw the rest of the bag away and went back to her old dental treat and haven't had any issues with throwing up.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My furbaby is on a low protein, low fat diet so many treats aren't compliant with her dietary needs. As a small dog she has the typical issues with her teeth and being olderived as well as eating a home cooked soft diet her teeth are a constant problem. These help keep the issue under contol, meet the standards set by her nutritionist and she LOVES them. A bit pricey, but overall worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Saintwic

customer_reviews.title: Dog lover's dog loves this treat!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why, but my dogs absolutely LOVE these bones. They are vegetable based so I am glad to give them as a treat since they seem healthier than rawhides, jerky, etc. My dog, corgi, is on a low protein diet and these are vegetable based, so he can have a treat and still stay on his diet. My other dog, greyhound mix, loves them also. Overall, a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs with allergies
customer_reviews.text: I have dogs with allergies, to almost everything...it's very difficult to find things free from most proteins, grains, eggs and dairy...these fit the bill...they don't last a super long time, but they are a nice treat for the dogs and they help a bit with dental care too.
customer_reviews.author: JMabie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite daily treat!
customer_reviews.text: My Mini Schnauzer, Alfred, has loved Zuke’s Z-Bone Dental Chews since his first day home. He looks forward to his daily dental treat. His favorite flavor is Apple. He likes the Carrot flavor but we don’t buy it because the color can mark the floor where it’s eaten. We love Zuke’s!
customer_reviews.author: A1

customer_reviews.title: My Guy Loves Zukes!
customer_reviews.text: He gets one every morning after breakfast & his morning walk. He goes right to the cupboard where they're kept & jumps and dances until he gets his "treat.". He's a 10+ year old lab & he still jumps and dances! Our Vet loves what great shape his teeth are in!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy H.

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible Vegan Dog Treats for a Healthy Canine Mouth
customer_reviews.text: How good are these? So good that twice my dog has managed to access a new bag of chews despite them being impossibly out of reach and devoured the whole bag. She loves them, her little brother loves them and I love that they’re vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a system that can't handle the junk that's in a lot of products and is unfortunately stuck into most treats. These are great. I have a German Shepherd and he's pretty rough on bones, this one lasts him a while and he doesn't get sick or have any reactions to them. He takes them out in less than 10 minutes but that's pretty good considering his track record and he just loves them, so definitely a good buy. I haven't noticed the apple ones giving him funny colored poop but the berry ones definitely do, keep that in mind if you notice something off when he's doing his business.
customer_reviews.author: madisongirl

customer_reviews.title: I suggest you do not buy from Barrons Best Goods
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, but when I ordered four bags of mini bones, I got 2 bags of large (very large) bones. This is extremely inconvenient and ridiculous, particularly when I went to return the item in hope of getting the right size, the item is marked as Not eligible for return. DO NOT BUY from this particular seller
customer_reviews.author: Michael Abrams

customer_reviews.title: two paws up
customer_reviews.text: My pugs absolutely LOVE carrots. So when I saw these chew bones made with their favorite thing on earth....I knew I had to get them. They have devoured them quickly and enjoyed every minute of it. A great treat that I'll be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!!!!  But they are too expensive!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like these better than any treat, but the cost is outrageous if you use them everyday. I'm looking for substitutes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: Short lasting and not so fresh smelling
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tiny size in green apple. I guess I was expecting these to be more like some that I picked up at the pet store (wish I could remember the brand). or more like "Greenies" from Costco. They only lasted about 3-5 minutes with my 13 wk old 13 lb puppy. The usual dental chews last at least 30-40 minutes with him and his tiny puppy teeth. I will keep searching for the mint smelling brand I bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: debhibb

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the first time for my dog who's rather fussy in his old age. He loves these, and they arrived the next day, So I've ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Caution re: chocking
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it four stars because although it says for puppy’s, you have to watch your dog (even if In the recommended age) or they could easily choke. They are very hard and dry out fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Zuke's products because of what they're made of and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Zuke's products because of what they're made of and so does my dog. My baby doesn't do well on grains so when I was looking for dental chews and came across these I had to get them. I can't tell you if they work yet but my vet recommended dental chews or daily brushing to preserve dogs' teeth. Our dog isn't a big fan of getting her teeth brushed and if this saves us from having her put under each year to have her teeth cleaned, I'm all for it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but very big!
customer_reviews.text: These are way too big for my 4 pound yorkie. She almost choked on the end. So I’ve had to cut them down the middle and put them in a kong holder so she can’t put the whole end in her mouth. I have to cut that up also. But I must say she loves them. Please make them in a smaller size for dogs under 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: jbnyc

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves 'em
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They clean his teeth very well and don't upset his food allergies/sensitive stomach. Def repurchase! They make so few dog treats that don't contain wheat, eggs, milk, sweet potato or chicken that my dog cannot have. These are a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Colder

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning for perfect smiles!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. It’s hard to find treats that are well-matched for dogs with dietary sensitivities so the limited ingredients list for these sensational snacks are super for my special pup. On our last visit to the vet, the professionals remarked on my dog’s fabulous dental health. We love these!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them, and they seem to like our dog...
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old cockapoo loves them. Helps keep his teeth in shape and his breath fresh (for a dog). Seems to digest them easily, which had been a problem with other brands of dental chews, including the green ones.
customer_reviews.author: Spud K

customer_reviews.title: My little guy loves these
customer_reviews.text: We have a new puppy and he loves these dental chews. He's a little guy, ~5.5lbs, and one of these bones will easily occupy him for an hour or more. Its his end of day treat and he wears himself out chewing on one. My only gripe is that as he gets to the end of it I'll find little, sticky rice sized bits left over. They will stick to carpet and his bed. A bit of a bother to clean them up but he stays in one place working on the bone so clean up isn't too hard. Better than him chewing on our nice sofa.
customer_reviews.author: K. Granholm

customer_reviews.title: Soft, and don't think it serves its stated purpose
customer_reviews.text: Z-Bones is misleading. These are soft and bone-shaped. Like that this is grain free and has fruit and vegetables which all dogs should have. However, I don't know that the texture is really all that effective at cleaning teeth.
customer_reviews.author: senneh

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced for how many "bones" you get. My dog kind of likes them, but they are definitely not chews. My 9 lb chihuahua finishes these just as fast as any other standard treat. They don't get chewed on long enough for them to be benefiting my dogs teeth. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I used to give my dog greenies and he choked/coughed a lot. I now use these and he does great with them.
customer_reviews.text: When Greenies first came out they were like doggie catnip for my dog. Then he started to cough/choke a lot and I was giving him the right size treat. I quit for years giving him anything. Then I found the z-bones.... wow... what a great treat. I've been feeding them to my dogs for a while and they love the apple and berry ones. For some reason carrot doesn't sit well with them but I can't complain. These are a great treat for my dogs and their breath for sure smells better with them.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: To give you an idea of what I'm working with I have two small breed dogs. 1) 20 lb Bichon mix and 2) 14 lb Shitzhu/Havanese mix. And they both love these treats. What makes it better for me, the human is that these little treats actually smell good too. (Some of the other brands we have tried smell awful while being eaten). They are small, but they take a few minutes to get through them which is a welcome distraction. I don't think they would work for dogs any bigger than 20 pounds due to their size.
customer_reviews.author: jenneratorcrafts

customer_reviews.title: Great for food allergies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my dog since he has so many food allergies. They were perfect where ingredients were concerned, unfortunately they lasted about a minute and he was quickly asking for more. My dog is a lab/golden retriever mix and he is a very heavy chewer, so nothing really satisfies his chewing. I was just trying to find something to occupy him so we can try to break the habit of him chewing on himself.
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua hates having his teeth brushed, and doesn't like most dental treats. He was so excited to eat this bone, he finished it as soon as he could!! They're a great size for small dogs, too. I'll be purchasing these again! I can't wait to see how much his teeth improve.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these chews
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these chews. They like their treats, but they flip when I ask them if they want a "Z bone". Have been serving Z-bones for a couple of years, one a day, and have had no problems. Our little Westie has a sensitive stomach plus a huge appetite and she has no problem digesting the Z-bones. I started buying them in the pet store but they're not always available. I was happy to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: These chews were a good alternative to Greenies when I ran out and needed ...
customer_reviews.text: These chews were a good alternative to Greenies when I ran out and needed something in a pinch. The bones themselves are actually brown instead of green like the picture. I do still feel like Greenies do a better job cleaning my dog's teeth and they last longer than these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My two minis love these! I have a 6 pounder and a 4 pounder. I cut them in half length wise with scissors, which makes them more customized to their size and makes twice as many. I don't find them as odorous as other people have mentioned, but I also haven't found many dog chewy treats that don't have some sort of odor! That being said, I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Apple ly.
customer_reviews.text: My boxer really likes them, freshens that killer Turkey and deer breath. Large is size used.
customer_reviews.author: Killerbees

customer_reviews.title: My labs favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes nuts for these! I took her to a petsmart to restock and my dog actually located the zukes on the aisle herself! ( stores are scarce on Zukes). All zukes treats are great and don’t upset her stomach
customer_reviews.author: Sunkissedsunkist

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but delicious
customer_reviews.text: Dog absolutely loved these and unlike Greenies or other similar products, these Z-bones actually lasted him awhile. The large size would take him maybe ten or fifteen minutes to finish, which gave me a nice little break from puppy training at work every once in awhile. However, they are pricey for the number of bones you get, so I won't be buying these on the regular (unlike Zuke's Minis or Zuke's Supers). Still, they're a good once-in-a-blue-moon treat that my dog enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these bones, but when I gave him one he looked at me like I was trying to pull a fast one! I ordered LARGE size bones, but received REGULAR size. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Small for my 25 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: My 25 pound Welsh Terrier loves these even though they're small for him. He finishes 1 chew in literally 2 minutes. I wasn't sure which size to get but went with the mini. The package says for dogs 5-25 pounds but for a different brand of chews, I bought the larger size and every time he eats 1 entire piece he throws up so he can only have half/day. Next time I'll try the larger size. Thanks Zuke's for another great treat for my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: My dog will eat anything, and this was no exception
customer_reviews.text: My dog will eat anything, and this was no exception. I hope it's good for her teeth. Definitely no effect on her breath, which is stinky as usual. But she enjoys these snacks, and I'll probably get them for her again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a good rawhide alternative
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product due to it's natural ingredients but unfortunately, it is soft so my dog just basically ate it rather than chewing on it for gum health.
customer_reviews.author: slmh

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard chewing older dog
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are grain free and have a hardness that is beyond most vegetable based chews, but not so hard as to wear down the teeth on our older dog, like beef bones did.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them, his stomach did not
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loved them but it caused horrendous diarrhea and some vomiting. It's clear that some dogs have different reactions to the product so I don't think that it's 110% the bone but there is something clearly in them that doesn't agree with all dogs so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: JerzeeShoreGirl

customer_reviews.title: Chewy Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these. He gets a half of one every morning after his walk. Very easy to break in half. Just wish they didn't discontinue the berry ones but he seems to like the carrot and apple ones just as much.
customer_reviews.author: SLN

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them but I'm not sure about the potato flour as an initial ingredient - still checking
customer_reviews.text: My dogs liked them but I was leery of the potato flour ingredient for everyday treats. They may be ok but I'll wait to research further before reordering. We usually buy the Mercola Dog bones but they've been out of stock for some time now. These may actually be the best choice till then.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I give my silky terrier one of these every night to help with her breath but mostly because she loves the taste. They are decently hard, enough where she still feels like she is getting a bone but not too hard. They are similar to the greenies dental treats but smell more like real ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Pup doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I don't know what it is about this but my pup doesn't like it. She will eat it because she's a dog and normally eats everything but it won't be her first choice. She'll hide it or leave it alone for a few hours. She actually threw it up today though.
customer_reviews.author: B Le

customer_reviews.title: Grain and soy free, made in the USA and a hit with my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these at a fancy independent pet store and they were a big hit with our puppy. I like that they are grain and soy free. I also like that they are made in the USA (we don't buy dog items that aren't). I don't like how expensive they are but Amazon's prices are better than I can find them (and it isn't easy to find them locally either). Our 60+ pound one year old Doberman googles them up a little faster than I might prefer but he does really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Caffeinated Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: Noticed by my vet!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old lab just had her annual visit and the vet tech asked me if I brushed her teeth. I occasionally do but I mentioned these to her and she said keep up the great work because she probably had the best looking teeth that she had seen on a 5 year old dog.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D.

customer_reviews.title: Zukes- always a good choice!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves all the Zuke's products. I love their ingredients. This bone is perfect size for my 7 pounder! The dental bone has a savory smell to it and my pup gets excited when he gets one!
customer_reviews.author: TrixieMaxxCloset

customer_reviews.title: A decent enough chew
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seemed to be fine with these. He didn't go crazy for them but didn't ignore them either. I thought he would've been more into them. Probably won't be buying them again for him. They came as expected, though, were a pretty solid consistency and were tough enough to be enjoyed for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and grain free. Great flavors.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these so much he forget to chew and chokes. Scary but great ingredients and grain free dental bones. I've tried several brands and these are the quality I was looking for. Has great yummy flavors.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog can be picky, especially when I offer her something new, but she grabbed it after one quick sniff and she ate it right away. She has liked every treat I have gotten her by Zuke's. They're a good size for my Shih Tzu... not too big, not too small. I'll definitely be getting these again, and trying the different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Keely M

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to Greenies
customer_reviews.text: Looking for another alternative to Greenies? This is perfect! My dog loves it and lasts longer than a Greenie.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa T

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. These dental chews are more expensive, but I don’t mind spending a little extra for good ingredients. Our dog patiently waits for her bone at the end of the day. We really like this company for using good quality ingredients in all of their products.
customer_reviews.author: gjhoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but high in calories
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, and I love the ingredients. My main issue with them is that they are so high in calories. The mini size bones have 49 calories per bone! For my dog's size, and sine I'm trying to get him to lose some weight, he is only supposed to have 315 calories per DAY, and they add up quickly. If they made a lower calorie version I'd be so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Adoo1980

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I have 2 shar peis and they did not have any allergic reaction to these. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Persinger

customer_reviews.title: These are the treats that will satisfy all your dogs desires
customer_reviews.text: These are the treats that will satisfy all your dogs desires. It has the toughness for the chew factor that your dog needs, the taste he wants, and you feel like the greatest pet parent in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Anewwayof

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his Z-Bones and I can feel good about helping keep his teeth clean. He also gets his teeth brushed every day, but every little bit helps and it gives him something to chew, after we had to stop giving him bones (he chipped several teeth on them). Amazon provides them at an unbeatable price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maeve

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these and so far they have not made them ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and so far they have not made them sick like other dental cleaning bones have. These are the perfect size for my chocolate lab, cocker spaniel beagle mix but a tad big for my 5mo old border collie pup.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how wax is safe for your dogs gutt?!
customer_reviews.text: First ingredient is wax, I think half . I was amazed wont be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Approves!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these dental chews. The apple and berry are his favorite flavors...he doesn't care too much for the carrot. So far, these are his all time favorite treat. I would suggest sizing down to the "regular" if you have a medium/large dog. My dog is around 55-60 lbs. and the regular is a good size for him (and we get a couple more in the bag). Zukes is a good brand and is one of the few I trust!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good But Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs liked these and I like that they are made from USA sourced ingedients but the price is just too much. We have a golden retriever and a chesapeake bay retriever so 6 count doesn't last us very long. If they were less expensive I would buy them more often but for the price they are just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them, and works with her L.I.D.
customer_reviews.text: My German shepherd has an extremely sensitive stomach, and other non-limited ingredient bones and treats frequently make her red and itchy, or even vomit... These ones seem to have no effect on her GI issues and she absolutely loves them. She doesn't beg for treats ever, but she runs over when she sees I am holding a bag of these---any of the Zuke's brand bones.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Houston

customer_reviews.title: maybe alittle bit better..
customer_reviews.text: Our GSD loves Greenies, but we switched to these to see if his constant scratching would go away. Well, the scratching is still there, maybe alittle bit better... but he's crazier for these than Greenies. They are pricey & hard to break in half, but for now we'll continue getting him Zuke's. We will get the smaller ones in the future though--just to make them go further:)
customer_reviews.author: kimmabby

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love 'Em, and so do Guests Who Smell Them
customer_reviews.text: Bad dog breath comes from a lot of different things, and the Zukes Z-Bones do help. I've gone through quite a few different treats and have landed on these as the best. I've read that some people's dogs have issues digesting them, I have a 4lb Chihuahua who doesn't have any issues, but he also love to chew and will make sure no large chunks are left. As with any treat, always give with cations, each dog has it's own limits and allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Bellafiore

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My rather finicky dog really likes these, and her even more finicky stomach has no problem with them. Plus it makes her breath smell a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hooten

product_meta.title: Zuke's Dental Chew Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Size:Mini| Color:Clean Apple CrispMake special adventures shared with your dog even more enjoyable with Zuke's Mini Z-Bone Grain Free Dental Chew Dog Treats With Apples. Founded in Durango, Colorado, and crafted in the USA using the Earth’s best ingredients, Zuke’s Z-Bone dental dog treats are the natural way to fight doggy breath. Z-Bone's unique texture cleans your dog's teeth, and parsley, alfalfa and fennel freshen your dog's breath. Zuke’s gluten free dog treats are made with real, whole apples plus vitamins and minerals for dogs. These grain free dog treats never contain corn, wheat, soy or gluten. Zuke's Z-Bones are easily digestible natural dog treats, so you can feel confident you are providing the best for your dog. A resealable pouch lets you take these apple dog treats on your favorite treks, whether that’s a day-long hike or a stroll in the park. Keep your dog smiling brightly while living life off leash with Zuke's Z-Bone Grain Free Dental Chew Dog Treats With Apples.
feature_bullets: Natural, grain-free dental chew for fresh breath on every adventure
Grain free dog treats never contain any corn, wheat, soy or gluten
Unique texture of dental bones gently cleans your dog’s teeth
Parsley, alfalfa and fennel help support fresh breath for dogs
One (1) 8.25 oz Bag - Zuke's Mini Z-Bone Grain Free Dental Chew Dog Treats With Apples

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
